Text.Page:
, the recipe is complete!
Meet me on the Island of Dawn.

- Olivung
You gathered Fimbrilisk's Durignite for Olivung, and exchanged it for the second piece.

Welcome, !

I've just finished designing my next recipe.

I call it 'Magma Ice Cream!'
I'll need you to get me some {@linkcreature:13#7005#Fimbrilisk}'s Durignite.

Be careful!

Thank you.
I never knew that Durignite was so beautiful. It's not hot, is it?

Now, let's get started with that ice cream.

It should be delicious!"I can't wait!"

It's a taste that you'll never forget!

This ice cream is truly a masterpiece!

Quick! Try it!
I want every gourmet in the land to experience this treat!

It's hot, but it's also cold, right? That's the beauty of the Fimbrilisk's Durignite!

I tried to make a loaf of bread with it long ago, but the bread got so cold...

Then I thought: I can use that to make ice cream!"This is fascinating!"

This was a very successful experiment. A fine dessert, fit for the goddess herself!

Here, take the second piece. I'd like to see how it changes the crown!

What a view...
It's as stunning as my cooking!

Hmm!

One last piece to go, right?"What do you need next?"

I've got so many ideas...I need time to decide which one to go with.

I'll send you a message when I'm ready. You can keep training in the meanwhile.

See you soon!
